cache.xcsrf_desc: XCSRF tokens should last a couple minutes without problem, there's no reason to change this value.
cache.verify_desc: Verification tokens should last a couple minutes without issue.
cache.roles_desc: This should be fine unless your group changes its ranks often.
cache.rolesetid_desc: This will be fine if you don't change your exile bot's rank often.
cache.product_desc: Product info rarely changes, especially for ROBLOX assets. If you are working with 3rd party assets that may change you can also change the expiration time.
